title: TDD Prep: Modal Endpoint (src/modal/)
description: Scaffold Modal app, Generator class, FastAPI endpoints with signatures/docstrings. Write failing tests for POST /generate, GET /health, error handling, response shapes. Depends on shared schemas.
close_reason: Modal endpoint scaffolded: app.py, generate.py, endpoints.py. 7 integration tests all fail with NotImplementedError (red phase ready).

title: TDD Prep: OBS Controller (src/obs/)
description: Scaffold OBS WebSocket controller and overlay manager with signatures/docstrings. Write failing tests for scene switching, overlay updates, graceful degradation when OBS unavailable.
close_reason: OBS controller scaffolded: controller.py, overlays.py. 7 tests all fail with NotImplementedError (red phase ready).

title: TDD Prep: Hero Shot Catalog Schema
description: Create catalog.json schema validation and test that checks minimum clip set, fallback tags, required fields. Mostly manual workstream but catalog validation is automatable.
close_reason: Hero shot catalog.json created empty. 4/10 tests pass (structural), 6 fail on empty catalog as expected.

title: TDD Prep: Chat Bot (src/bot/)
description: Scaffold twitchio bot, command parser, rate limiter, queue, modal client, OBS notifier. Write failing tests for command parsing, rate limiting, queue bounds, degraded mode.
close_reason: Chat bot scaffolded: commands.py, queue.py, modal_client.py, obs_notify.py, main.py. 21 tests all fail with NotImplementedError (red phase ready).

title: TDD Prep: Model Setup Scripts
description: Scaffold model download (setup_model.py) and benchmark (benchmark.py) scripts with function signatures. Write failing tests for benchmark output format and model storage validation.
close_reason: Model setup scripts scaffolded with signatures. 5/8 benchmark tests pass (structural), 3 fail on NotImplementedError as expected.

title: TDD Prep: Shared Schemas (src/common/schemas.py)
description: Scaffold Pydantic request/response models shared by endpoint and bot. Write failing tests for schema validation. Dependency for both Modal Endpoint and Chat Integration workstreams.
close_reason: Shared schemas scaffolded with Pydantic models. All 13 schema validation tests pass.
